name: Dome Romantik
description:
Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 48
Best played with the download executable, browser has some audio issues. If it sounds strange, best go for the downloadables.
The post-jam version has some smaller changes. Changelog for domeromantik.exe <-> domeromantik_orig.exe
made tiles rough for a better lookadded jetpack particles for playerslight rebalancinggave bottom tiles a slightly different look, to indicate their hardnesspause menu opens on game startup, with fullscreen button. Now closable with Pause/Ptext now readable if playing in lower than 1920x1080 resolutionbetter indication of end goal
Attribution
Ending Song: Celosia by sawsquarenoise
